title: Google Cloud Storage
description: Google Cloud Storage (GCS) - not Google Drive

project_number.title: Project Number
project_number.description: Project number (optional, needed only for list/create/delete buckets - see your developer console)

user_project.title: User Project
user_project.description: User project (optional, needed only for requester pays)

service_account_file.title: Service Account File
service_account_file.description: Service Account Credentials JSON file path. Leave blank normally. Needed only if you want use SA instead of interactive login

service_account_credentials.title: Service Account Credentials
service_account_credentials.description: Service Account Credentials JSON blob. Leave blank normally

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Short-lived access token. Leave blank normally. Needed only if you want use short-lived access token instead of interactive login

anonymous.title: Anonymous Access
anonymous.description: Access public buckets and objects without credentials. Set to 'true' if you just want to download files and don't configure credentials

object_acl.title: Object ACL
object_acl.description: Access Control List for new objects

bucket_acl.title: Bucket ACL
bucket_acl.description: Access Control List for new buckets

bucket_policy_only.title: Bucket Policy Only
bucket_policy_only.description: Access checks should use bucket-level IAM policies. Requires Cloud Storage version 1.17.0+

storage_class.title: Storage Class
storage_class.description: Storage class for newly created objects in GCS

no_check_bucket.title: No Check Bucket
no_check_bucket.description: If set, don't attempt to check the bucket exists or create it

decompress.title: Decompress
decompress.description: If set, decompress gzip encoded objects. Can't check size and hash but file contents will be decompressed

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Endpoint for the service. Leave blank normally

env_auth.title: Environment Auth
env_auth.description: Get GCP IAM credentials from runtime (environment variables or instance meta data if no env vars). Only applies if service_account_file and service_account_credentials is blank
